Reviews.Content: paris pleasure august time stayed hilton arc de triomphe wrote disappointing pricei posted rate outrageous time radisson blu location similar experience worse crappy wood floors worse bathroom cold shower somewhat unpleasant staff elevator didnt times choice hilton day price stay former sofitel boutique chain worth looking

Reviews.Title: “Great location, faulty aircon, fair price”

Reviews.Content: booked business company location conference walked everyday palais des congress front facing view arc de triomphe business hotel run international management company fuss clean reasonably quiet double glazed windows front wifi included issue aircon faulty day reported previously business price reasonable id stay location leisure bland hotel otherwise staffs genuine nice

Reviews.Title: “Everything I expect from Radisson (despite expensive breakfasts!)”
Reviews.Author: Tabascoleathergrain
Reviews.Content: regularly stayed radisson hotels throughout world rarely disappointed champs elysees version maintained success rate wife found staff willing help courteous able communicate effectively despite basic french indeed exception individuals frontofhouse spoke excellent english double 7th floor balcony overlooked arc de triomphe 100 yards eiffel tower visible buildings opposite inside deskchair plus armchair table ample space hangers inside wardrobes clothes tv variety french channels plus usual additions cnn bbc world assortment foreign stations range payperview films available teamaking facilities slight reservation cost breakfast ranging 2429 euros person continental english respective extremes admit fare offer excellent wishing spend looking snack nearby cafes offering simple breakfast 614 euros etoile rermetro 200 yards rest paris easily accessible alternative walking required

Reviews.Content: stayed single night business tiny clean business traveler impressive larc de triomphe nice location ate breakfast bit frustrating staff serve six kept waiting

Reviews.Content: global traveler straight saying radisson blue champs elysées stands quality home feeling quality hotel assets position near arc de triomphe proximity metro shopping restaurants near stands remarkable kindness staff little potentially serious emergency solve time staff disposition help difficult choose hotel paris

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location, great staff, would go again.”

Reviews.Content: cant terms location paying paris hotel avenue marceau steps arc de triomphe champs staff feel welcome unlike stereotype paris service air conditioning system broken weather nice windows charming street picture hotel compensated including breakfast sodas frm mini bar free comfortable modern clean

Reviews.Title: “Small but beautiful rooms.”

Reviews.Content: spent nights hotel satisfied nice beautiful flat screen tv breakfast included nice restaurant ground floor breakfast food sweat taste eat breakfast days location hotel perfect walk city subway nearest station minutes hotel perfect romantic weekend maybe view didnt

Reviews.Title: “good location”

Reviews.Content: stayed friend 23rd 26th june spent time researching hotels travel agent choosing radisson blu mainly location fan hotels contemporary boutique option plus staff friendly reservations check etc public including bar restaurant terrace main bad size cente paris furnishings worn shabby including bathroom disappointed 3 star overdue refurbishment reason feel recommend clients

Reviews.Title: “Great Location for sightseeing in Paris!”
Reviews.Author: AngelUrbano
Reviews.Content: spent weekend radisson champs elysees hotel street champs elysees 3 streets air france bus takes terminal 2 charles de gaulle airport orly hotel boutique hotel 40 doesnt matter didnt spend time ours clean contained weekend break bed comfortable arrived hotel greeted reception swiftly checked concierge bags magically staff friendly helpful bar dining outside patio overlooked noisy pretty look facilities looked hotel handy walk bateaux mouche tours eiffel tour arc de triomphe le lourve etc walked lots eat drink nearby arent brave public drugstore doors hotel contains lots shops delibakery license pierre herme concession baby clothes pharmacy designer bags cigars newsagents cocktail barrestaurant hotel price expensive paid husbands goldpoints recommend staying prepared pay price deal definitely

Reviews.Title: “Not as good as expected”
Reviews.Author: dk011
Reviews.Content: nights location excellent hotel clean downsides price paris standards bed uncomfortable service bar slower expect cost breakfast €22 continental quick continental serve bar €11 croissant butter jam coffee average prices value €160 paying location

Reviews.Title: “I miss a buffet breakfast - otherwise an OK hotel”

Reviews.Content: stayed radisson blu five days business trip paris hotel ok modern bit dark opinion reception hotel maintained hotel bit pricy hotels paris service staff impeccable missed hotel proper breakfast overpriced breakfast menu hotel arranged normal buffet breakfast

Reviews.Title: “Not as good as I expected”

Reviews.Content: wasnt bad wasnt stayed 3 nights pricy booked top floor suite consisted sitting separate toilet smallish bedroom bathroom whirlpool bath shower patio didnt normal review restricted comments based price paid normal cheaper value layout son sleep sitting seen days wasnt dirty scuffed fashioned floor scuff marks bed pulled grout bathroom white scale marks granite sinks water dripped cleaned tried patio nice didnt view surrounded plants arc de triomphe stood chair bit fawlty towers sea view rickety boarding maintenance bed comfy vibrations nearby extractor shake bed dont aid sleep dark fitted wardrobes found couldnt doors shut natural light lighting nearby actually claustrophobic times ive experienced bathroom toiletries mixed bunch oddly hair conditioner threw bit didnt home usually replenished stay deal bottle cheap champagne ice bucket night left melted water nights didnt drink didnt fresh ice inspired drink breakfast nice english cooked breakfast ive seen didnt worry pastries else depending sat breakfast veered reception conference little display times service bit slow fairly location metro eating shopping stay nicer nicer hotels lovely trip

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel - but not sure if it's worth it”

Reviews.Content: spent weekend radisson champs elysees hotel nice spacious elegant etc expensive paid using radisson gone paying cash unfortunately breakfast included stay discovered departure hideously expensive 24 eur pretty basic breakfast paris im decent breakfast nearby half price
